page.title: 10EXAMPLES OF GAMES JUNIORS
page.content: CHINESE WHISPERS A whispered sentence passed down a line to see how many words change. KING BALL Agame of throw and catch the ball over the heads of two teams to a base line. ELASTICS Played because of the availability of elastic from industries. A jumping game over streched elastic. BOARD GAMES Families sit around a table and play games of chance based on the turn of a card or throw of a dice. TELEVISION GAMES Pretend games developed to imitate television characters or situations.
